title: tozhudAl tIrumE
sahitya:
tozhudAl tIrumE tollai yAvumE tOghai mayil vAhana mOhana muruganai


anupallavi

  uzhudu uramiTTa shezhum kazhani shUzhum pazhaniyampati vAzhum parama karuNAnidhiyai


caraNam    azhudu pulambi uLLam ArAt-tuyaram uTru allalUruvOrkku illai vElan pOl tuNai
vizhudUnri viNNaLAva virinda Ala vrkS nizhal pOl tApam nIkkit-tigazhvOnai
